definition: the green acidic fruit of any of various lime trees, cover with lime so as to induce growth
details:
noun
- the green acidic fruit of any of various lime trees
- any of various deciduous trees of the genus Tilia with heart-shaped leaves and drooping cymose clusters of yellowish often fragrant flowers
= synonyms: linden, linden tree, basswood, lime tree
- any of various related trees bearing limes
= synonyms: lime tree
- a sticky adhesive that is smeared on small branches to capture small birds
= synonyms: birdlime
- a white crystalline oxide used in the production of calcium hydroxide
= synonyms: calcium oxide, calx, calcined lime, fluxing lime, unslaked lime, burnt lime
- a caustic substance produced by heating limestone
= synonyms: calcium hydroxide, slaked lime, hydrated lime, calcium hydrate, caustic lime, lime hydrate
verb
- cover with lime so as to induce growth
= example: cover with lime so as to induce growth
- spread birdlime on branches to catch birds
= synonyms: birdlime
